page.title: 15Clubs <continued>
page.content: {Criftins' Girl Guides Criftins girl Guides meet every Wednesday at the Scout-Hut at 7.00 until 9.00.Every Wednesday we do lots of activities, like going for nature walks in the country and finding out about our village.In guides we have four patrols.There is Nightingale, Kingfisher,Canary and Thrush. A couple of weeks ago we went to a pioneer camp in Llanablodwell in Wales. It was a prisoner-of-war camp during the last war. We do lots of things in Guides our Guider is called Mrs.Thompson and her assistant is called Mrs.Calnon.There are sixteen of us in Guides altogether. To be a Guide you need to make this promise: "I promise that I'll do my best,to do my duty to God.To serve the .
